extends GenericUtility

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private class  FamilyTreeUtils.Constraints
      Defines ranges and constraints of values for data when it is randomly generated during construction of the family tree
      private class  FamilyTreeUtils.FirstNameJSONList
      Represents the entire object returned from fnames.json
      class  FamilyTreeUtils.GenerationAttempt
      Records data (number of created Persons/Events) to be returned by the generateFamilyTree() method
      private class  FamilyTreeUtils.LastNameJSONList
      Represents the entire object returned from snames.json
      private class  FamilyTreeUtils.Location
      Represents a location according to the structure of locations.json
      private class  FamilyTreeUtils.LocationJSONList
      Represents the entire object returned from locations.json

    • Method Detail

      • generateFamilyTree

        public FamilyTreeUtils.GenerationAttempt generateFamilyTree​(User user,
                                                            int numGenerations)
                                                     throws DatabaseException,
                                                            BadAccessException
        Generates a fake family tree by generating/tying people together for a user
        Parameters:
        user - is the user whose family should be generated
        numGenerations - is the number of generations to generate
        Returns:
        a GenerationAttempt, containing information on what happened during the procedure
        Throws:
        BadAccessException - when the user's information is not properly cleared/ready (lingering Person/Event references, particularly)
        DatabaseException - whenever another database error occurrs

      • generateFamilyTree

        public FamilyTreeUtils.GenerationAttempt generateFamilyTree​(User user)
                                                     throws DatabaseException,
                                                            BadAccessException
        Generates a fake family tree with a default number of generations
        Parameters:
        user - is the user whose family should be generated
        Returns:
        a GenerationAttempt, containing information on what happened during the procedure
        Throws:
        BadAccessException - when the user's information is not properly cleared/ready (lingering Person/Event references, particularly)
        DatabaseException - whenever another database error occurrs

      • recursiveFillPerson

        private void recursiveFillPerson​(Person personToFill,
                                 FamilyTreeUtils.Constraints constraints,
                                 FamilyTreeUtils.GenerationAttempt attempt)
        Recursively "fills" a given Person, meaning: 1. birth and death Events are created (only birth for user's person) 2. parents are generated for and tied to the person (father/mother IDs) 3. a marriage event is created for each set of parents added, and their spouse IDs are set to each other
        Parameters:
        personToFill - is the Person to perform the recursive iteration for
        constraints - is the Constraints object which defines the valid ranges for newly generated data
        attempt - is the GenerationAttempt to record certain actions

      • createUserPerson

        private Person createUserPerson​(User user,
                                FamilyTreeUtils.GenerationAttempt attempt)
        Creates and tracks a new Person for the User we are generating for
        Parameters:
        user - is the User whose Person this is
        attempt - is the GenerationAttempt to record the creation
        Returns:
        the new Person instance

      • createBirthEventFor

        private Event createBirthEventFor​(Person person,
                                  FamilyTreeUtils.Constraints constraints,
                                  FamilyTreeUtils.GenerationAttempt attempt)
        Creates a birth event for a person inside the bounds of the constraints
        Parameters:
        person - is the person to generate the event for
        constraints - is the constraints that defines valid birth event states
        attempt - is the GenerationAttempt to record the new event with
        Returns:
        the new birth event

      • createDeathEventFor

        private Event createDeathEventFor​(Person person,
                                  FamilyTreeUtils.Constraints constraints,
                                  FamilyTreeUtils.GenerationAttempt attempt)
        Creates a death event for a person inside the bounds of the constraints
        Parameters:
        person - is the person to generate the event for
        constraints - is the constraints that defines valid death event states
        attempt - is the GenerationAttempt to record the new event with
        Returns:
        the new death event

      • createMarriageEventsFor

        private Event[] createMarriageEventsFor​(Person parent1,
                                        Person parent2,
                                        FamilyTreeUtils.Constraints constraints1,
                                        FamilyTreeUtils.Constraints constraints2,
                                        FamilyTreeUtils.GenerationAttempt attempt)
        Creates two marriage events for two Persons, assumed to be married, inside the bounds of the constraints
        Parameters:
        parent1 - is either the mother or the father
        parent2 - is the mother if parent1 is the father, and vice versa
        constraints1 - is the constraints for parent1
        constraints2 - is the constraints for parent2
        attempt - is the GenerationAttempt to record the new event with
        Returns:
        the pair of newly generated marriage events

      • createMotherFor

        private Person createMotherFor​(Person child,
                               FamilyTreeUtils.GenerationAttempt attempt)
        Creates a new mother given some child
        Parameters:
        child - is the Person who should be treated as the child
        attempt - is the GenerationAttempt to record the new mother with
        Returns:
        the new mother Person

                                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

        a new Location to use for an Event

      • randomChoice

        A utility helper function that returns a random object given a list of objects
        Type Parameters:
        ObjType - is the type of the objects in the "objs" array
        Parameters:
        objs - is the array of ObjTypes
        Returns:
        a random object from the "objs" array

      • randomRange

        private int randomRange​(int low,
                        int high)
        A utility helper function that returns a random integer between low and high. Any value between low and high, including low and high, can be returned
        Parameters:
        low - is the lower int bound
        high - is the upper int bound
        Returns:
        a number equal to or greater than low, while also equal to or less than high

      • max

        private int max​(int a,
                int b)
        A utility helper function that returns the higher of two integer values. Negative numbers are treated as "lower" (ie -4 is less than -3)
        Parameters:
        a - is an integer
        b - is another integer
        Returns:
        the larger value of the two integers

      • min

        private int min​(int a,
                int b)
        A utility helper function that returns the lower of two integer values. Negative numbers are treated as "lower" (ie -4 is less than -3)
        Parameters:
        a - is an integer
        b - is another integer
        Returns:
        the lower value of the two integers
